About us
Founded in 2004, Shenzhen C&D Electronics has been the global leader in wireless universal control solutions for smart home and home entertainment. We are dedicated to creating new and innovative control solutions through advanced technology to enhance your daily life in delightful and powerful ways â€“ at home, at work and at play.
As the leading global manufacturer of remote controls, C&D Electronics has been working with many Fortune 500 customers such as Samsung, Philips, CISCO, LG, TCL, Foxconn on video, television, streaming, telecommunications, smart home from design, engineering to manufacturing. Its annual capacity exceeds 35 million units.
C&D committed to creating a more sustainable future to reduce environmental impact. C&D is approved ISO9001:2008 quality management system and ISO14001:2004 environmental management system certification.

results.title: Company Profile--Shenzhen C&D Electronics Co., Ltd—GLOBAL PROFESSIONAL ...
results.content: The company's smart light control, smart door control, smart window control, smart set-top box controller, various audio and video remote controls, mobile APP, Bluetooth, zigbee and WiFi central control terminal products have been expanded to more than 3,000 models.
results.raw_content:
Shenzhen C&D Electronics Co., Ltd. was established in August 2004 with a registered capital of 10 million yuan and more than 2,000 employees. The company is one of the leading companies in the domestic control field and has become a national high-tech enterprise integrating R&D, manufacturing, marketing, branding and other comprehensive competitiveness. The company's smart light control, smart door control, smart window control, smart set-top box controller, various audio and video remote controls, mobile APP, Bluetooth, zigbee and WiFi central control terminal products have been expanded to more than 3,000 models. The company has 409 national patents, including 24 invention patents, 286 utility model patents, 64 appearance patents, and 35 software copyrights. The company has successively passed the ISO9001: 2008 quality management system ISO14001: 2004 environmental management system, as well as CE certification, FCC certification and compliance with the relevant EU environmental protection directives (WEEE&ROHS) requirements.
The company actively participates in domestic and international exchanges in the intelligent control industry, and extensively develops industry-university-research cooperation with universities and colleges, so that the company always has the vitality of development and innovation. The company focuses on the development and production of smart home control, and 80% of its products are sold to overseas markets. It is not only satisfied with the technological advantages and product advantages already possessed, but also focuses on win-win cooperation, value creation and serving the society. Harmony, cooperation, and coordinated development are the unremitting pursuit of Chuangrongfa people. "Take the society, use the society" is the concept of Chuangrongfa people's public welfare contribution. Chuangrongfa people always integrate this pursuit and love into the company's corporate culture and company's development.
